## RequestThumbprint type

Type representing a unique request thumbprint.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RequestThumbprint = {
    clientId: string;
    authority: string;
    scopes: Array<string>;
    homeAccountIdentifier?: string;
    claims?: string;
    authenticationScheme?: AuthenticationScheme;
    resourceRequestMethod?: string;
    resourceRequestUri?: string;
    shrClaims?: string;
    sshKid?: string;
    shrOptions?: ShrOptions;
};
```
**References:** [AuthenticationScheme](./msal-common.authenticationscheme.md)<!-- -->, [ShrOptions](./msal-common.shroptions.md)
